description:
Poor freeter Chitose Shusuke is spending the day at cafe Alexander again with the regular Kakeru and waitresses Eriko and Kinako when the bartender Karuo suggest they hold a mixer. Narita Hayato prowls Yanagihara at night. He exchanges greetings with the locals while heading to "Paru Crepe" to see if there`s any work for his self-managed construction company. Misora Academy student Haneda Takashi has another peaceful day. However, he carries a secret...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Example, That Kind of Fairytale
たとえばそんなメルヘン
